title: Stream: Two Door Cinema Club – Beacon
content:
Having made the crossover between NME adored indie act to mainstream commercial success, Two Door Cinema Club’s sophomore LP Beacon is one of 2012 most anticipated records.

Recorded in Los Angeles with Jacknife Lee (U2, Snow Patrol, Bloc Party), the first single from the album, Sleep Alone was released at the tail end of July. Despite not being out for another month (3 September), the trio comprised of Alex Trimble, Kevin Baird and Sam Halliday have made Beacon available to stream in it’s entirety, presumably due to the record leaking onto to the internet.
